name: Roboboi and The Great Loss of Control
name_original: Roboboi and The Great Loss of Control
description:
You are roboboi. You must survive on a rogue spaceship as long as possible as meteors and solar flares tear the environment apart!

A and D to move. Left click to pickup or drop items. Hold left click to use items. Left shift to boost in the direction you are moving (you need speed to get it started though).

Each console powers one of the controls. If the console's health drops below the orange warning bars, that control will be disable until you find a wrench and repair the console.

Solar flares will drop fire into the ship. Use a fire extinguisher to put out the fires before they spread across the floor and make it dangerous to repair your control consoles!

Features that had to be dropped to make the jam deadline:

Multiple stages (Instead of "survive as long as you can")

Thruster effects for the boost ability.

A joke where in the final stage, your ship crashes into a star labeled 2020.
